name: Fear Smith
description: The Fear Smith is a medium fey creature with a chaotic appearance, embodying the essence of fear. It has a haunting gaze and an unsettling demeanor.
memorable: The Fear Smith uniquely manipulates fears, disorienting its foes and gaining vitality from their terror.
goals: To instill fear and chaos among its opponents while evading threats.
relations: It may be found among other fey creatures or allied with chaotic entities.
environment: Typically dwells in mystical woodland areas or places infused with magic.
strengths: Exceptional Charisma grants powerful intimidation and control abilities.
weaknesses: Weakness in physical strength makes it less effective in direct confrontation.
attacks: The Fear Smith's multiattack consists of three claw strikes that deal slashing and additional psychic damage, utilizing fear to siphon life from its prey.
most_powerful_ability: Distortion Gaze causes disorientation, significantly hindering the movement of its enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures effectively.
skills: Excels in Intimidation and Stealth, allowing it to control encounters through fear and subterfuge.
additional_information: Has resistance to non-cold iron weapon damage.
Immunities to charmed and frightened conditions.
Can cast spells like detect thoughts and fear at will.
Regains hit points from psychic damage inflicted through its abilities.
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
spellcasting: Can cast spells such as detect thoughts and fear, and has limited use of charm person and command.
